name: Prohive
tag_list: job, creative-professionals, artist, photographer, architect, designer
overview:
Prohive is a online portal for creative professionals.

Whether it is a Graphic designer, Model, Singer-Songwriter, Food Stylist, Documentary Film Director, Wildlife Photographer, Actor, Your work needs to receive the right type of exposure - for anybody to meet the right opportunity! A killer portfolio does more than just showcase your work. It transforms visitors into potential clients. Their vision is to liberate the creator. At Prohive, talent and the market are made fully accessible to each other on an unbiased platform. Here, the creatorâ€™s work alone speaks. They also provide powerful tools for employers to sort through the various showcases and refine the quality of their search results.
